sentences.sContent: And yet, when they woke Jesus, he said to them, “Why are you afraid?
sentences.sContent_eng: And yet, when they woke Jesus, he said to them, “Why are you afraid?
sentences.sCn: 可是，他们叫醒主耶稣时，主耶稣对他们说：“你们这小信的人哪！

sentences.sContent: To my surprise, I woke up in my bed the next morning.
sentences.sContent_eng: To my surprise, I woke up in my bed the next morning.
sentences.sCn: 令我惊讶的是，第二天早上我醒来时发现在我的床上。

sentences.sContent: Have you ever woke up and forgot how to speak English?
sentences.sContent_eng: Have you ever woke up and forgot how to speak English?
sentences.sCn: 你有过一觉醒来忘记怎么说英语的经历吗？

synos.tran: 唤醒；激发；使…复活（wake的过去式）

phrases.pCn: 醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相
紧紧跟随；随着…而来；作为…的结果；仿效
[物]尾流（由空气动力压力差产生的一对绕着翼尖的闭合涡旋）
维克森林（指美国北卡罗来纳州一城镇或大学）
维克森林大学（美国一所私立大学）
